Help:Node.title: Translator
Help:Node.Log:Description:
Title: translator
Important Commands: @speak
The translator profession raises your income and allows you to speak a variety of languages.
You can change the language you are speaking by typing @SPEAK Calabrese/or other. You can hear what your language sounds like to other people by typing @SPEAK FEEDBACK.
The four great Houses generally hire translators. In addition, their teachers can teach you new skills to compliment your knowledge of languages.
See Also: houses, language
